!Captain Alex: A number of goods -- about 10 items total -- have been stolen from Warehouse Keeper Sonin's warehouse. During my investigation, I narrowed the list of suspects down to 5 creatures: *Delu Lizardman Suppliers, Special Agents, Commanders, Shaman and Cursed Seers*. Find the thief, recover the *10 Stolen Cargo* items and return them to Sonin. Then I am sure he will, in gratitude, provide you with the letter of reference. [Quest _135_TempleExecutor alankell_q0135_02a.htm|Go back and hear the other problems.] [Quest _135_TempleExecutor alankell_q0135_07.htm|Let Alex know you understand the problems of the townspeople and are ready to begin helping now.]
